conclusion: Analyze the v-t graph to determine the initial distance between Car A and Car B.
Car A starts at 25 m/s and Car B starts at 15 m/s. Car A stops at 25 s and Car B stops at 30 s.
Calculate acceleration for Car A as -1 m/s².
Calculate acceleration for Car B as -0.5 m/s².
Determine position function for Car A: x_A(t) = 25t - 0.5t².
Determine position function for Car B: x_B(t) = 15t - 0.25t².
Solve for d using t = 20 s: d = 100 m.
Initial distance between Car A and Car B is 100 m.
